post:
It has been an amazing year since getting a providertag on the LES forums last August!
So .... Thank You... all for being part of the community!

There are many amazing things in the works, that you will come to see from MyRootPW until the end of the year. I have a hard time waiting for them to be ready, so i can unveil them.

> So let us kick the celebration off with an incredible 40% recurring discount on the Dedicated Server offerings. 
> **Code:  1YearOnLES40PercentOFF**

MyRoot.PW offers Bare Metal unmanaged Servers in central Europe
(Vienna/Austria). Delivery in less than 12 Hours!

==================>>Server Inventory:

**MR1**
C3558 (4c,4T)
32GB ECC RAM
2x4TB HDD+1x120GB NVME 
10 TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console available
 ~~55~~ **33 EURO per Month** - [[ORDER]](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=167&coupon=1YearOnLES40PercentOFF "[ORDER]")

**MR3**
Xeon D-1540 (8c,16t)
32GB ECC RAM
2x 4TB HDD (CMR), 7200 rpm
10 TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console available
 ~~70~~ **42 EURO per Month** - [[ORDER]](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=168&coupon=1YearOnLES40PercentOFF "[ORDER]")

**MR5**
C2550 (4c,4T)

4x 3TB (CMR) 7200 rpm
10 TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console available
 ~~50~~ **30 EURO per Month** - [[ORDER]](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=170&coupon=1YearOnLES40PercentOFF "[ORDER]")

**MR7**
E3-1230v3 (4c,8t)
32GB ECC RAM
2x 4 TB HDD
10 TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console available
~~70~~ **42 EURO per Month** - [[ORDER]](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=172&coupon=1YearOnLES40PercentOFF "[ORDER]")

==================>>Add-on Pricing:
General:
* IPv4 Addresses: +1x ipv4......+1.5 Euro/Month
* Upgrade to 15TB Transfer ......+10 Eur/Month

==================>>Legal/Misc Stuff:

* Knowledgebase: [[KB]](https://myroot.pw/user/client/plugin/support_manager/knowledgebase/ "[KB]")

_Valid until 21.August.2021 or until i run out of stock on the hardware for the offers (before the 21st)._

Got any Questions or Requests? Contact: **support (at) myroot (dot) pw**
